taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a table in the Editor area with more than one group already designed.
taskbody.context: To change the column where tree nodes are displayed:

step.cmd: Select any of the group items in the Editor area.
To move all groups at the same time to the next column, do one of the following:

choices.choice: Press the Right or Left arrow keys.
Right-click and select Move Table Group Right/Left.
